comments:
Hi

When i look in my workspace .metadata\.plugins\org.eclipse.cdt.core\.log 
file i have about 80 mb of log filled with:

MESSAGE java.lang.ClassCastException: 
org.eclipse.cdt.internal.core.dom.parser.cpp.CPPASTName incompatible with 
org.eclipse.cdt.core.dom.ast.cpp.ICPPASTCompositeTypeSpecifier ENTRY 
org.eclipse.cdt.core

regards

I also get these errors when searching:

!MESSAGE An internal error occurred during: "Search "AnyParameter::updateDependentParameters(SetupNumber, bool, bool)"".
!STACK 0
java.lang.ClassCastException: org.eclipse.cdt.internal.core.dom.parser.cpp.CPPASTName
	at org.eclipse.cdt.internal.core.dom.parser.cpp.CPPVisitor.isConstructor(CPPVisitor.java:619)
	at org.eclipse.cdt.internal.core.dom.parser.cpp.CPPVisitor.createBinding(CPPVisitor.java:570)
	at org.eclipse.cdt.internal.core.dom.parser.cpp.CPPVisitor.createBinding(CPPVisitor.java:189)
	at org.eclipse.cdt.internal.core.dom.parser.cpp.CPPASTName.resolveBinding(CPPASTName.java:52)
	at org.eclipse.cdt.internal.core.dom.parser.cpp.CPPASTQualifiedName.resolveBinding(CPPASTQualifiedName.java:45)
	at org.eclipse.cdt.internal.core.dom.parser.cpp.CPPVisitor.createBinding(CPPVisitor.java:521)
	at org.eclipse.cdt.internal.core.dom.parser.cpp.CPPVisitor.createBinding(CPPVisitor.java:189)
	at org.eclipse.cdt.internal.core.dom.parser.cpp.CPPASTName.resolveBinding(CPPASTName.java:52)
	at org.eclipse.cdt.internal.core.dom.parser.cpp.CPPScope.getBinding(CPPScope.java:109)
	at org.eclipse.cdt.internal.core.dom.parser.cpp.CPPSemantics.lookup(CPPSemantics.java:1015)
	at org.eclipse.cdt.internal.core.dom.parser.cpp.CPPSemantics.resolveBinding(CPPSemantics.java:611)
	at org.eclipse.cdt.internal.core.dom.parser.cpp.CPPVisitor.resolveBinding(CPPVisitor.java:934)
	at org.eclipse.cdt.internal.core.dom.parser.cpp.CPPVisitor.createBinding(CPPVisitor.java:183)
	at org.eclipse.cdt.internal.core.dom.parser.cpp.CPPASTName.resolveBinding(CPPASTName.java:52)
	at org.eclipse.cdt.internal.core.dom.parser.cpp.CPPVisitor$CollectReferencesAction.visit(CPPVisitor.java:1304)
	at org.eclipse.cdt.internal.core.dom.parser.cpp.CPPASTName.accept(CPPASTName.java:90)
	at org.eclipse.cdt.internal.core.dom.parser.cpp.CPPASTIdExpression.accept(CPPASTIdExpression.java:46)
	at org.eclipse.cdt.internal.core.dom.parser.cpp.CPPASTBinaryExpression.accept(CPPASTBinaryExpression.java:80)
	at org.eclipse.cdt.internal.core.dom.parser.cpp.CPPASTIfStatement.accept(CPPASTIfStatement.java:82)
	at org.eclipse.cdt.internal.core.dom.parser.cpp.CPPASTCompoundStatement.accept(CPPASTCompoundStatement.java:66)
	at org.eclipse.cdt.internal.core.dom.parser.cpp.CPPASTFunctionDefinition.accept(CPPASTFunctionDefinition.java:93)
	at org.eclipse.cdt.internal.core.dom.parser.cpp.CPPASTTranslationUnit.accept(CPPASTTranslationUnit.java:531)
	at org.eclipse.cdt.internal.core.dom.parser.cpp.CPPVisitor.getReferences(CPPVisitor.java:1956)
	at org.eclipse.cdt.internal.core.dom.parser.cpp.CPPASTTranslationUnit.getReferences(CPPASTTranslationUnit.java:220)
	at org.eclipse.cdt.core.search.DOMSearchUtil.getNames(DOMSearchUtil.java:394)
	at org.eclipse.cdt.core.search.DOMSearchUtil.getNamesFromDOM(DOMSearchUtil.java:371)
	at org.eclipse.cdt.internal.ui.search.DOMQuery.run(DOMQuery.java:115)
	at org.eclipse.search2.internal.ui.InternalSearchUI$InternalSearchJob.run(InternalSearchUI.java:93)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.jobs.Worker.run(Worker.java:58)

Maybe they are related?

Is this really in 3.1? DOMQuery in your stack trace no longer exists in 3.1.

At any rate, I've added instanceof checking around the offending code so the CCEs shouldn't happen any more.

Just another entry to illustrate ;)

Im using cdt.core v. 3.1.200604070500 and it spits out:
